rows.label: tlk42100141_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Long before Vandham-san became a mercenary,
he was in Fons Maim.

rows.label: tlk42100141_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Vandham is a pseudonym; his real name is
Aquila Paronet Sol Esteriole.

rows.label: tlk42100141_03_msg0003
rows.name:
He was a big shot from the Paronet family,
one of Invidia's noble houses.

rows.label: tlk42100141_03_msg0004
rows.name:
By the way, the name Vandham was taken from
a famous person Vandham-san admired
when he was little.

rows.label: tlk42100141_03_msg0005
rows.name:
How do I know so much? I happened to overhear it
back when Vandham-san was still hale and hearty.
